Package de.oth.blocklib.materials

Class Material

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.materials.Material
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseMaterial, BillboardMaterial, DebugGridMaterial, DeferredLight.DeferredLightMaterial, GBufferShader.GBufferMaterial, GUIMaterial, HeightMapMaterial, LineMaterial, ShaderDemo.DemoMat, ShadowMaterial, SkyboxMaterial
public abstract class Material
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
Base class for all materials Contains information to be used by a shader, such as textures, color or other uniform data
Author:
Tobias Werner WiSe17/18
